reference.title: wctomb : minimal wide char to multibyte converter

section.title: Description
section.p: This is a minimal ANSI-conforming implementation of wctomb. The only "wide characters" recognized are single bytes, and they are "converted" to themselves.
Each call to wctomb copies the character wchar to *s, unless s is a null pointer.

section.title: Returns
section.p: This implementation of wctomb returns 0 if s is NULL; it returns 1 otherwise (reporting the length of the character "sequence" generated).
